TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphTypeface extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

span.span: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件是對應至單一字體的字型系列表示由 OpenType 字型檔案，或序列化為的文件中的記憶體區塊的低層級文字物件。The object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document. 正確要用於測試回合中指定的邏輯字型的字元通常由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字型系統而且已記錄在所產生的物件列格式化文字和物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。The correct to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the objects generated by the object and line formatting text [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. 提供屬性和方法：The provides properties and methods for: - 取得字型通用度量，例如的高度和深度的 em 大小比例。Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size. - 取得度量、 大綱，以及個別圖像 （glyph） 的點陣圖。Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs. - 文件中的序列化。Serialization in a document. 下列清單描述類型的應用程式案例，說明使用低層級的值會控制，物件提供。The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the object provides. - 固定的格式文件產生器可能會使用為內嵌在文件容器中取得字型的二進位映像A fixed format document generator may use the to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container - 印表機驅動程式可使用取得字型字符外框或點陣圖或整個字型映像傳送至印表機。A printer driver may use the to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer. - A檢視器應用程式可能使用取得度量和點陣圖的資訊。A viewer application may use the to obtain metric and bitmap information. 每個字符定義指定與其他的對齊方式的標準。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 下圖會定義圖像 （glyph） 字元的度量值。The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters. ![圖像度量作圖器](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "圖像度量作圖器")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 度量的圖像 （glyph） 字元的值Metric values of glyph characters

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`. 建構物件不會使用樣式模擬。The constructed object does not use style simulations. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的新執行個體藉由指定的字型檔案位置的類別。The following example shows how to create a new instance of the class by specifying a font file location. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet1)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet1)]

param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.

One of the values.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`和`styleSimulations`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.

span.span: Gets the advance heights for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，其中包含索引鍵-值配對的圖像 （glyph） 該代表提前高度資訊。

span.span: An object that contains key-value pairs that represents advance height information for the glyphs.

value.span: 索引鍵是可識別圖像索引。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 值是，代表提前高度。

span.span: The value is a that represents the advance height.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來計算垂直版面配置。The property is used for calculating vertical layout. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從字型中字符傳回預告高度的集合。The following example shows how to return the collection of advance heights from the glyphs in the font. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet2)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基準值表示相對於 em 大小英文基準從儲存格上方之間的距離。The baseline value represents the distance from cell top to English baseline relative to em size.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ BottomSideBearings { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

span.span: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 索引鍵是可識別圖像。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph.

value.span: 值是表示之間的距離。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑箱下的邊緣換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內時，值為正數。The value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 字型儲存格高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 值為負數黑箱下的邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。The value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑箱尾端邊緣換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內時，值為正數。The value is positive when the trailing edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 值為負數黑箱右邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。The value is negative when the right edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刪除線的位置值是通常是正數的因為刪除線通常高於基準。The strikethrough position value is usually positive because the strikethrough is generally above the baseline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑色方塊的上邊緣的預告高度和字型儲存格高度來定義對齊矩形內時，值為正數。The value is positive when the top edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance height and font cell height. 字型儲存格高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 值為負數黑色方塊的上邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。The value is negative when the top edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 底線位置是相對於基準和相對於 em 大小。The underline position is relative to the baseline and relative to the em size. 傳回的位置值是通常是負的因為底線通常是低於基準。The returned position value is usually negative because an underline is usually below the baseline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型廠商可以將唯一的序號內嵌在 URL 中，然後可以用來登錄該字型。A font vendor could embed a unique serial number in the URL, which could then be used to register the font.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FaceNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FaceNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the object.

span.span: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，其中包含代表 Win32 字體名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.

value.span: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 物件。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值為表示 Win32 字體名稱的字串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字型未提供指定之語言的名稱，它會傳回英文版的字樣名稱。If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English. Win32 字體名稱可識別加權 （而不是一般或粗體顯示），及/或樣式，但是不會識別 stretch 或是其他的加權。The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FamilyNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FamilyNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the object.

span.span: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 物件，其中包含代表 Win32 系列名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.

value.span: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 物件。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值為表示 Win32 系列名稱的字串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字型不提供指定的語言輸入姓氏屬性會傳回英文版的系列名稱。If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the property returns the family name in English. Win32 系列名稱排除規則或粗體加權和樣式，但包含其他的粗細和自動縮放。The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
